case_vignette: A 39-year-old pregnant woman at 16 weeks gestation recently underwent a quad-screen which revealed elevated beta-hCG, elevated inhibin A, decreased alpha-fetoprotein, and decreased estradiol. An ultrasound was performed which found increased nuchal translucency.
question: Which  is recommended for diagnosis?
correct_ans: confirmatory amniocentesis and chromosomal analysis of the fetal cells
